server

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • server.Server

  • public class Server
extends java.util.Observable
    Version:
    1.0 date 2020-10-09 This class is needed for handling of GUI and communication between server and client.
    Author:
    Christoffer Rova

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Server.packetReader
      packetReader is a class that will be run as a thread and its purpose is managing the communication from client to server.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Server

        public Server(int port)
       throws java.net.SocketException,
              java.net.UnknownHostException
        The constructor that creates a socket, a board object and GUI.
        Parameters:
        port - A integer for the port number that is going to be used for the server.
        Throws:
        java.net.SocketException - Throw exception if something went wrong creating the socket.
        java.net.UnknownHostException - Throw exception if the address is wrong.
